title: France panorama. [No. 68/15]
brief_description: French cinemagazine items: 1. Hungarian President visits France. 2. Hirson (Aisne) - A wig factory which dominates the world market for artificial hair pieces. 3. Le Laboratoire de l’Invisible - a lab that analyses and dates museum and artistic artefacts. 4. European gothic. 5. Claude Chabrol. 6. The art of ‘kinetic’ modelling.
